reporter_caption.center: GRAND LODGE OF DELAWARE v. ODD FELLOWS CEMETERY, 26 (Del. 2003)

caption.center: GRAND LODGE OF DELAWARE, I.O.O.F., a Delaware Corporation, Plaintiff
Below, Appellant, v. ODD FELLOWS CEMETERY OF MILFORD, INC., a Delaware

opinion.posture: Court Below: Court of Chancery of the State of Delaware in and for Kent County, C.A. No. 1461
opinion.panel: Before VEASEY, Chief Justice, BERGER, and STEELE, Justices.
opinion.opinion_text:
This 28th day of October, 2003, upon consideration of the briefs of the parties, and given our standard of review it appears to the Court that the judgment of the Court of Chancery should be affirmed on the basis of and for the reasons set forth in its Order dated December 31, 2002.
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS ORDERED that the judgment of the Court of Chancery is AFFIRMED.
